import { useEffect } from "react" function EventCard({title, imgPath, children}){ const cardStyle = { display:"flex", flexDirection:"row", // flexWrap:"wrap", // alignItems:"center", // backgroundColor:"rgb(178, 228, 237)", backgroundColor:"white", padding:"10px", flex:"1 1 calc(30%)", boxShadow:"0 4px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)", borderRadius:"20px", boxSizing:"border-box", margin:"10px", } useEffect(() => { if(window.innerWidth <= 600){ cardStyle.flexDirection = "column" } else{ cardStyle.flexDirection = "column" } }, [window.innerHeight]) return

{title}

{children}
} function Events(){ return <>
